name: Castle of the Winds I: A Question of Vengeance
description:
Get ready for the fight of your life!

The goal? Avenge the death of your godparents and reclaim your birthright. The twist? You create your own character, determining his/her sex, strength, intelligence, and dexterity. Sounds easy enough, right? Think again.

Castle of the Winds is going to take every bit of courage, wit and quick thinking. Armed with basic weapons, you are let loose in a tiny hamlet. While exploring, you discover bits and pieces about your past. Go on to journey through a mine in the mountains, a tiny village, and finally, a giant fortress. There is just one piece of information we have yet to mention.

Along the way, you will meet up with over 100 evil monsters, which must be slain to reach your goal! Battle everything from devils to dragons, humans to humanoids -- each more dangerous than the last. Do not give up! If you keep your wits, you will discover magic potions, scrolls mapping out different levels, and more to help you along the way.

With stunning graphics and one thrilling challenge after another, Castle of the Winds 1 is the game you have been waiting for!
